structure.grid
Class GridUtilities

java.lang.Object
  structure.grid.GridUtilities

public class GridUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Class to create and handle grid objects for AtomList objects.

Since:
3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Abdullah Kahraman

Method Summary
static void cluster(Grid grid)
          Assigns all grid cells that same unique number if they can be connected via other grid cells that have all the isOccupied() state set to TRUE.

          Returns the GridCell element that is equal to the target GridCell object.

Method Detail

getNumberOfGridCellsFittingIntoHemisphere

public static int getNumberOfGridCellsFittingIntoHemisphere(double radius,
                                                            double gridCellSize)
Returns the number of grid cells that fit within the hemisphere.

Parameters:
radius - - double value representing the radius of the hemisphere.
gridCellSize - - double value representing the size of the grid cell.
Returns:
integer value representing the number of grid cells.

cluster

public static void cluster(Grid grid)
Assigns all grid cells that same unique number if they can be connected via other grid cells that have all the isOccupied() state set to TRUE.

Parameters:
grid - - Grid object which has been set up for an AtomList object.

getVolume

public static Point3d getVolume(Grid grid)
Returns the volume information of a grid.

Parameters:
grid - - Grid object from which the volume is calculated from.
Returns:
Point3d object with volume X-coordinate = occupied volume, Y-coordinate = unoccupied volume, Z-coordinate = total volume.

getUnoccupiedCells

public static java.util.ArrayList<GridCell> getUnoccupiedCells(Grid grid)
Returns all cells that are unoccupied.

Parameters:
grid - - GridObject from which all unoccupied cells will be extracted.
Returns:
ArrayList of GridCells being unoccupied.

getNeighbouringCells

public static java.util.ArrayList<GridCell> getNeighbouringCells(GridCell cell,
                                                                 Grid grid,
                                                                 int cellSize)
Returns all direct neighboring grid cells.

Parameters:
cell - - GridCell object whose neighborhood is to be determined.
grid - - Grid object that holds all grid cells including the cell and all neighboring grid cells.
cellSize - - integer value representing the number of shells from which neighborhood is to be extracted.
Returns:
ArrayList of neighboring grid cells.

isAccessible

public static boolean isAccessible(Atom atom,
                                   AtomGrid grid)
Checks whether any neighbouring cells in a shell contain occupied labeled cells.

Parameters:
atom - - Atom object to be checked whether it is solvent accessible.
grid - - Grid object that holds all grid cells including the cell and all neighboring grid cells. Prior to the execution of this method, the Grid object must have been searched for the boundary cells with the BoundarySearch class.
Returns:
TRUE if cell is accessible, FALSE otherwise.
See Also:
BoundarySearch

equals

public static GridCell equals(GridCell target,
                              java.util.ArrayList<GridCell> cells)
Returns the GridCell element that is equal to the target GridCell object.

Parameters:
target - - GridCell object against which cells will be matched.
cells - - List of GridCell objects to be matched against target.
Returns:
GridCell object if found in the list of GridCell object, otherwise NULL.
